## Loading and preprocessing the data

### Load Libraries  (install these packages if not currently installed)
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)
library(markdown)
```
### Set default settings for R markdown
```{r}
echo = True  # Display code along with results
options(digits=2)  # Set output values to 2 decimal places
```

### Unzip data and read in data
```{r}
unzip("activity.zip") 
data = read.csv("activity.csv", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
data = tbl_df(data)  # Convert to Table class for use with dplyr and tidyr
```
